block.p: BERSON-Charlotte. July 17, 2000. Age 83. Beloved wife of the late Lawrence. A very special mother to Bert, Judy, Eleanor (Lester), Marilyn (Barry) and the late Roz. Adored grandmother of Ilene, Gabrielle, Jennifer, Jonathan, Joanna, Stephanie, Amanda, David, Danny, Alana and Lee. Great grandmother of five. Devoted sister, aunt and friend. ''Granny'' to all. Service 10AM Wednesday, I.J. Morris, 1895 Flatbush Ave, Bklyn.
